title: Strengthening Instructional Practice Competencies: Digital Tools for Enhancing Online Classroom Management Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning platform usage and graduate-level academic experience in science fields
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can effectively utilize at least three types of digital tools (e.g., virtual lab platforms, real-time collaboration tools) for managing online science lab classes.
Learners can explain the procedures for establishing a T.A. or peer support system to resolve technical/pedagogical issues in online learning environments.
Learners can design and apply specific methodologies (e.g., discussion facilitation techniques, feedback systems) to adapt face-to-face teaching strategies to digital environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
